概述   软件包  类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个软件包   下一个软件包 框架    无框架    

软件包 mycom.android.sdklib.build

接口摘要
ApkBuilder.JarStatus Status for the addition of a jar file resources into the APK.
 

类摘要
ApkBuilder Class making the final apk packaging.
ApkBuilderMain Command line APK builder with signing support.
 

异常摘要
ApkCreationException An exception thrown during packaging of an APK file.
DuplicateFileException An exception thrown during packaging of an APK file.
SealedApkException An exception thrown when trying to add files to a sealed APK.
 

概述   软件包  类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个软件包   下一个软件包 框架    无框架
